title: fo-10: Main Flow Integration
description:
Wire up the FO-10 main flow controller, server actions, and page routing.

## Spec
`docs/projects/2026-02-09-fo-10/2026-02-09-fo-10-spec.md`

## Key Files
- `app/fo-10/components/fo-experience.tsx` — main flow controller with fixed 4-question sequence
- `app/fo-10/actions.ts` — server actions for chip generation and affirmations
- `app/fo-10/page.tsx`, `layout.tsx`, `fo-10-layout-client.tsx` — page routing

## Worker Notes
- Adapt FO-09's fo-experience.tsx state machine for fixed question flow
- No dynamic screen generation needed — questions are hardcoded
